title: Can we have a function in game where I don't get players in my games anymore
body: Title speaks for itself, Would love to filter out certain players from my games so I don;t see them

replies.body: They have that installed already after match have a look at the player you don't want to see anymore and ban him :) i don't work for riot but i respond faster than the workers that work for riot hahaha go figure
Yeah riot is an actual fucking joke if they think their game is balanced atm, how about stop adding items and champions and fix the current state of the game
